New Records: Dunith Wellalage scored 67 not out in the first ODI
Key Match Events: Rohit Sharma's 58 off 47 balls, Virat Kohli's 24 off 32 balls, K.L. Rahul's 31 off 43 balls, Axar Patel's 33 off 57 balls, Shivam Dube's 25 off 24 balls
Wanindu Hasaranga's three for 58, Charith Asalanka's three for 30, Dunith Wellalage's two for 39
Post-Match Reflections: The match ended in a tie
Dunith Wellalage was awarded the Man of the Match award
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a tricky pitch that offered considerable assistance to the spinners
India and Sri Lanka shared the spoils in the first ODI
